projects.title: Portfolio Website
projects.description: The Portfolio Website project is a personal website designed to showcase an individual's skills, experiences, projects, and accomplishments.

projects.title: Movies Mingle
projects.description: A Movie Mingle project aims to replicate the core functionality and user experience of the popular movie streaming platform Netflix.

projects.title: Weather App
projects.description: The Weather App project is a web application that provides real-time weather data for any location in the world.

projects.title: Spotify Clone
projects.description: A Spotify clone website project aims to replicate the core functionality and user experience of the popular music streaming platform Spotify.

projects.title: Crrency Converter
projects.description: A currency converter website that allows users to easily convert between different currencies using the latest exchange rates.

projects.title: Password Generator
projects.description: The Password Generator Website is a web application designed to generate strong and secure passwords based on user-defined criteria.
